Package ohos.multimodalinput.event

Class EventCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.multimodalinput.event.EventCreator

  • public final class EventCreator
extends Object
    Provides methods for creating events. Currently, only the method of creating the KeyEvent event is provided.
    Since:
    4
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.MultimodalInput#MULTIMODAL_INPUT

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createKeyEvent

        public static Optional<KeyEvent> createKeyEvent​(int action,
                                                int keyCode)
        Creates a KeyEvent object based on the specified action and keycode.
        Parameters:
        action - Indicates the action taken for the key. The value can be KeyEvent.KEY_PRESSED or KeyEvent.KEY_RELEASED.
        keyCode - Indicates the keycode for the key. For details about the keycodes, see KeyEvent.
        Returns:
        Returns a KeyEvent object; returns an empty object if action is not a valid value, or the keyCode value is less than or equal to 0 or greater than the maximum keycode (KeyEvent.NOW_MAX_KEY) defined in the system.
        Since:
        4
